text: Black is a first-person shooter video game for PlayStation 2 and Xbox in 2006, then two years later ported into Xbox 360 in 2008. Developed by Criterion Games, and published by EA Games. Black: Remastered is the latest ported exclusively for Xbox One. ==Other websites== *Black at EA Games * Category:2006 video games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:First- person shooters Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Single-player video games Category:Xbox games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Black (2006 video game)
